titles.title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 in order to require reciprocal responses to foreign acts, policies, and practices that deny national treatment to United States investment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to require the United States Trade Representative to impose conditions that prohibit or limit foreign investment in the United States on those foreign countries that impose similar conditions on U.S. investment.
